My Services 2

Risk Management

Experienced in risk management, I have a strong ability to identify, assess, and mitigate potential risks to ensure business continuity and project success. I use a structured approach to evaluate risks, develop strategies for mitigation, and implement monitoring processes to minimize negative impacts. By leveraging data-driven insights and collaborating with key stakeholders, I have successfully reduced operational, financial, and strategic risks, contributing to more resilient and efficient outcomes. My proactive risk management approach helps organizations navigate uncertainty while safeguarding their long-term objectives.

Solution Delivery

Skilled in solution delivery, I have a proven track record of managing the end-to-end implementation of projects, from initial planning and development to successful deployment. I ensure that solutions are delivered on time, within budget, and meet all specified requirements. My ability to coordinate cross-functional teams, manage stakeholder expectations, and maintain clear communication throughout the process has consistently resulted in high-quality outcomes. I am committed to delivering impactful solutions that address business needs and drive operational success.

Problem Solving

Strong problem-solving skills demonstrate the ability to identify challenges, analyze complex situations, and develop practical solutions. I excel in evaluating issues, gathering relevant data, and applying creative and analytical thinking to resolve problems efficiently. Whether working independently or collaborating with teams, I approach problems with a structured mindset, balancing attention to detail with a focus on long-term goals. My ability to solve problems effectively has consistently led to improved processes, increased efficiency, and successful project outcomes.

My Resume

Experience
  • Programme Manager 2015 - 2024
    DSTA

    As a Programme Manager for classified systems, I oversaw the end-to-end delivery of secure, high-stakes technology projects, ensuring compliance with strict security protocols and government regulations. I led cross-functional teams in the planning, execution, and integration of classified systems, managing risks, budgets, and timelines to ensure successful outcomes. My role involved coordinating with key stakeholders, ensuring clear communication, and maintaining the highest standards of confidentiality and data protection throughout the project lifecycle, delivering secure solutions that met both operational and security requirements.

  • Cybersecurity Professional 2017 - 2024
    DSTA

    As a Cybersecurity Professional for classified systems, I was responsible for safeguarding sensitive information by implementing and maintaining robust security measures in compliance with government regulations and security standards. I conducted risk assessments, developed and enforced security protocols, and managed access controls to prevent unauthorized access to classified systems. My role included monitoring system vulnerabilities, responding to security incidents, and ensuring the integrity and confidentiality of data throughout the system lifecycle. I collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure all cybersecurity measures were aligned with operational requirements while maintaining the highest level of security for classified information.

  • Software Engineer 2006 - 2014
    DSTA

    As a Software Engineer for classified systems, I was responsible for the end-to-end development of secure software solutions, adhering to the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) to ensure efficient, reliable, and compliant system delivery. My role included gathering requirements, designing, coding, testing, and deploying classified applications, while rigorously maintaining data security and regulatory standards throughout the process. I also led the integration of overseas systems, ensuring seamless compatibility and secure data exchange across international platforms, while addressing potential security risks and ensuring full compliance with government regulations. My contributions ensured that the classified systems met both operational and security objectives for RSAF
